nodes.text: Imperial Guard was a crimson-colored wine with fruit flavors and aromas. It was available on tap at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu, and it was suitable for consumption by humans. It was considered bold and robust like the former Galactic Empire.

Imperial Guard has been sold to customers at Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge since the opening of the theme park in 2019. At a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019 prior to the opening, "Imperial Red Cab Sav" was announced. The menu description for Disney's Hollywood Studios reads, "Fully clad crimson-colored, nicely focused red cherry and raspberry aromas combined [sic] robust red berry fruit flavors, a touch of caramel, dark chocolate, and spice with long, supple tannis [sic]."
